message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $8,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate you recognizing the value of this product. However, I'm looking for something closer to my original asking price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet the price you've asked. I would like to offer $8,800 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
